1. I noticed that China is significantly higher in both categories compared to the US and India. I Also notice that as the years go by, the categories increase in all three countries. I wonder what the graph will look like in 20 years. These categories have a deep impact on my life and it is important I stay informed as laws continue to be passed. 

Headline: Clean Power vs. Fossil Fuels

As the years go by, the categories increase in India.
